text: Filme fraco, o roteiro é fraco, as cenas são fracas, a história é fraca, o elenco é fraco, e ninguém ajuda a melhorar o filme, os personagens são fracos, e o filme deveria ter cenas bem melhores e relevantes, para fazer o filme ser bom
Not as good as the first but also a lot of fun. It’s well worth watching a few times to catch all the fun details.
Great sequel! Very funny, definitely worth watching!
Great sequel. Anything  having to do with the  Stone Age, slice of life and comedy, I am down for.

The Croods is one of the best animations made in years, it has an excellent and well-constructed story. The final scenes of the Thunder Sisters are simply impeccable lol. Rating 8.0

An odd but colorful sequel to The Croods!

What A Hoot!!! Croods the new age was three times better than the first one. I was glued to my seat and truly was surprised by the voice cast and the excitement of the story. This is one movie the whole family can watch on movie night with popcorn, a soda, a some candy.
A worthy sequel. Fantastic fun, with some very zany parts!
Loved to see the comeback of cage and shows what sacrifices are to be made when wanting independence
